relation: Education is a RIGHT and must be provided in an appropriate environment to ALL individuals.
School district is responsible to identify a student’s disability.
School district provides free testing and evaluation.
School district develops Individualized Education Plans, (IEP) to define educational services.
IEP determines services and school district must ensure that services are provided under IEP. All teachers are contacted by Special Ed. Staff.
Fundamental Alteration of programs and curricula are required.
Personal services for medical or physical disability are required.
Education is NOT A RIGHT. Students must meet certain admissions criteria defined under ADA-AA as “otherwise qualified.”
Student must provide documentation and pay for evaluation if there is one.
Student must identify needs and request services.

Student is responsible to initiate action for services.The Learning Accommodation Center will assist students with disabilities to develop a Faculty Request for Services and to advocate, if difficulty arises, but responsibility lies with the student.
